name: "REVOLUTION" -Remake SC1-
description:
Chapter\_5: "REVOLUTION" \_Remake SC1\_ bÃªta version.

\-Original fitfh Terran mission scenario from SC1, with all dialogues and features.

\-Only original units, with the old tech tree. I bet you will start to feel back in the old days, with the apparition of the wraith, the dropship, Kerrigan ect...

\-Also, lot of added stuff, especially cinematics and secondary objectives.

\-More difficulty.

\-Known problems: -some dialogues during the game just do not want to work, I don't get why. -some bugs still, it is not the real final version. -I didn't manage to fix Kerrigan's Lockdown button.	-Sometime the AI does strange things.	-This is my second map, so please don't be too harsh!

So, try it if you want, and please tell me what you think about it!
author: _ForgeUser6333587
